message.name: ERR_XRV_OFFICE_STARTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_EXTPARTY_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date of an external party office must not be earlier than the Registration Date of the related External Party.

message.name: ERR_XRV_OFFICE_ENDDATE_LATER_THAN_EXTPARTY_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date of an external party office must not be later than the End Date of the related external party.

message.name: ERR_XRV_OFFICE_STARTDATE_LATER_THAN_ADDRESS_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date of an external party office must not be later than any of its external party office address Start Dates.

message.name: ERR_XRV_OFFICE_ENDDATE_EARLIER_THAN_ADDRESS_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date of an external party office must not be earlier than any of its external party office address End Dates.

message.name: ERR_XRV_OFFICE_STARTDATE_LATER_THAN_PHONE_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date of an external party office must not be later than any of its external party office phone number Start Dates.

message.name: ERR_XRV_OFFICE_ENDDATE_EARLIER_THAN_PHONE_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date of an external party office must not be earlier than any of its external party office phone number End Dates.

message.name: ERR_XRV_OFFICE_STARTDATE_LATER_THAN_MEMBER_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date of an external party office must not be later than any of its external party office member Start Dates.

message.name: ERR_XRV_OFFICE_ENDDATE_EARLIER_THAN_MEMBER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date of an external party office must not be earlier than any of its external party office member End Dates.

message.name: ERR_FV_OFFICE_EXTERNAL_PARTY_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: External Party Name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_OFFICE_EXTERNAL_PARTY_OFFICE_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: External Party Office Name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.
